On the page for each course, you will find three buttons like the ones below to i) open the slides in a new tab and view them online, ii) download a PDF version of the slides, and iii) download the R code for the course.

<p class="buttons" style="text-align:center;"><span class="btn btn-danger">{{< fa arrow-up-right-from-square >}} Read the slides online </span> <span class="btn btn-danger">{{< fa file-pdf >}} Download the PDF version </span> <span class="btn btn-danger">{{< fa code >}} Download the R code </span> </p>

For each course, you can navigate the slides by using the <kbd>←</kbd> and <kbd>→</kbd> keys. Pressing <kbd>m</kbd> will display all commands you can use (e.g., <kbd>f</kbd> to switch to full screen mode).
